body.name: BALEAF Women's Sleeveless Tank Tops V-Neck Tunic Workout Long Loose Fit Camis Flowy Yoga T-Shirts Cute Tee for Casual Summer
features: Cool-dry Fabric: Stay cool and comfortable all day with our women's sleeveless V-neck tunics. Made from premium moisture-wicking and breathable materials, it keeps you dry and fresh even during hot summer days. Ideal for casual wear or any active lifestyle.

Butterfly Hemline & Cinch Waist: Enhance your silhouette with our butterfly hemline. It provides a flattering coverage for your hips while cinch waist detail adds shape and accentuates your curves. Whether you want to dress up or dress down, this tank top will always make you look stylish.

V-Neck: Stand out with trendy V-neck design that highlights your collarbones and adds a touch of elegance. Perfect for those who want to showcase their neck and shoulders, while stay fashionable and chic during the hot summer months.

Loose Fit: Our loose fit sleeveless tunics is designed to minimize shoulder coverage, giving you a carefree and breezy feel. Pair it with jeans, yoga pants, leggings or shorts for a casual and relaxed look.
Various Occasions: Our women's sleeveless V-neck dress tank top is perfect for everyday wear, beach trips, picnics, parties, or even workouts. Stay stylish and comfortable no matter where you go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Casual Tunic Tank
reviews.reviewText: I was really pleased with this tunic tank when it arrived. I usually sit between a L and an XL for tops, and seeing the pics with the flowy fit, I went with the L (and I’m glad I did). It fit really nicely in the chest area -- the extra elastic both helps keep it from gapping like some tunic tanks I have and gives it a bit more character in how it lays. The loose and flowy fit means it lays nicely over my hip and tummy area. I also liked the color -- I ordered the teal blue, and although I would say I felt it was more of a steel blue, I thought the color was nice, and it goes well for me with both dark capris or dark leggings. It’s very lightweight without being see-through at all, so it breathes well for me, and it goes nicely under a lightweight cardigan or flannel if I need an extra layer. I’ve put it through the wash (delicate, cold cycle, hang dry), and it came through just fine. Overall I’m happy with this casual tank.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Stretchy flowy oversized v-neck active tank top
reviews.reviewText: This tank top is very well made with great design features, like the rounded V-neck, wide straps (no sleeves), ruched sides (under ribs on either side) and long flowy hemline. However, the XXL is HUGE! I order a lot online and usually the XXL works for me, but this one is enormous, I can’t wear it. It’s more like a 4X in my honest opinion. Which is great for body positivity and being more inclusive with sizing, I fully support that! But I ordered the size according to their size chart, and it’s at least 2 sizes larger than I expected based on their chart. I can’t speak to the other sizes but I would recommend this to plus size women, not petite or smaller size women. I consider myself the low end of plus size, but I’m disappointed in all the extra fabric used for this shirt. I love the shirt & wish I could wear it! It’s an awesome shirt! Just be careful with sizing! I would have returned it but I gave it to my mom who can wear it instead.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice tank top for working out
reviews.reviewText: I am a walker, and I ordered this tank top in gray. The color is kind of drab, and the top is very loose. I missed the part of the description that said loose fit, so that is my fault. I normally wear a medium or large and ordered a large. I wish I would have ordered the medium. The material is well made and is not sheer but is lightweight. The top is comfortable, and I expect that it will hold up very well, as all my Baleaf clothing has.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and flattering
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this tank for my plus-sized self, and I am so glad I did. The fit on this tunic is great, I appreciate that even though it is plus-sized, the armpits aren't so huge that they expose the entire side of my body. The drape is great, a bit of a very forgiving "swing" at the bottom, and the length is perfect for me (I'm 5"8'). The material is light and breathable, but not see through. This is a wonderful athleisure tank, great for the gym, sleeping in and as a layering piece in cooler weather. I love the blue color as well. I think that the price is a bargain for the quality of what you get.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Unflattering top. I usually wear a medium but got the small after reading reviews. It was still big and baggy. Material was very thin and felt cheap overall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfy, true-to-size & Flattering
reviews.reviewText: Like a lot of women, I got fluffy during the pandemic. I am 20 lbs heavier than I have ever been my whole life. Not fully there, but feel like I am now on the "plus size". I am 5'8 " 175lb and wear a size 12 and have a full bust. Finding clothes that are comfy and flattering has been tough lately. I wasn't really looking or expecting this to be flattering. I was just looking for something practical to wear to physical therapy after shoulder surgery. To my surprise this is both comfy, practical and flattering. Price is comparable to other similar tops, but I feel that it would be a better seller at a price point between $15-$17 rather than the current price of $20. Other than the recommendation on price, I have no complaints.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice and loose fitting
reviews.reviewText: This BALEAF workout top is very loose fitting below the chest line for me. I did order a L where it's possible a M would have fit. I'm roughly a 14 for tops. 42" at the widest.This top is very comfortable, I could wear it every day.Super soft material and washes well. I used Med heat on the drier and it still dried quickly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely delighted with this tank top!
reviews.reviewText: I ordered BALEAF's Women's Workout Tank Tops Sleeveless V-Neck Tunic Long Loose Fit Camis Flowy Yoga T-Shirts Cute Tee for Casual Summer in Teal Blue. I am absolutely delighted with this tank top! The buttery soft material is incredibly comfortable to wear, and the weight of the fabric is just perfect - it lays and swings beautifully. I especially adore the bit of cinching, which adds both style and shape to the top. This versatile top is perfect to wear for workouts or going out. I highly recommend BALEAF's Women's Workout Tank Tops Sleeveless V-Neck Tunic Long Loose Fit Camis Flowy Yoga T-Shirts Cute Tee for Casual Summer to anyone looking for a comfortable, stylish, and versatile top!
